packageUpsellOfferInfo.title: Upgrade to SiriusXM All Access
packageUpsellOfferInfo.description: Add premium channels plus streaming for an additional $3.34 per month

packageDescription.name: SiriusXM All Access
highlightsText: 350+ channels in your car, on your phone, at home, and online
Two dedicated Howard Stern channels, including video
Every NFL, MLB® and NBA game and NASCAR® race. NHL®, NCAA® and PGA TOUR® coverage
Ad-free music and Xtra channels to stream for every mood and activity
Thousands of shows and videos available on demand
packageDescription.footer: Have it all, with every channel we offer and the freedom to enjoy them anywhere—in your car, on the app, and at home.
packageDescription.promoFooter: Listen & Watch your favorites in all your favorite places-- in your car, on your phone or at home, for only {price} per {term}

termUpsellOfferInfo.title: Start with 12 Months and Save
termUpsellOfferInfo.description:
Add 6 more months for an additional $3.26 per month

Get 12 months of SiriusXM Select for $99. You'll save $32.88

Compared to the 6-month deal after 12 months. Based on regular $16.99/mo rate. Fees and taxes apply. See offer details.
